title: Blackstone to Acquire BioMed Realty Trust for $8 Billion
text:
Published By: NYTimes Int. Business - Today 
Affiliates of a Blackstone real estate fund are to pay $23.75 a share for BioMed Realty, a 10 percent premium to its closing price on Wednes...
